package.name: StorageByName
package.shortDescription: Sort apps storage in Preferences by name, size and date

descriptionlist.description:
Sort and search apps storage in Preferences by name, size, last used and install date.

Compatible with iOS 11+
Might work on lower iOS version as basic support is added, but not tested.

To support development: https://www.paypal.me/udevs
